title: The Christian moderator. Third part. Or, The oath of abjuration arraign'd by the common law and common sence, ancient and modern Acts of Parl. declarations of the Army, law of God and consent of reformed divines. And humbly submitted to receive judgment from this honorable representative.
author: Birchley, William, 1613-1669.
publisher: Printed by J.G. for Richard Lowndes at the White-Lyon in S. Pauls-Church-yard,
